title: Keeping Black Men In Front Of The Class
text:
Keeping Black Men In Front Of The Class 
Published By: WGBH - Today 
Of all the teachers in the U.S., only 2 percent are black and male. That news is bad enough. But it gets worse: Many of these men are leavin...
